name: PLG Contact us button on Send single touch in bulk

steps.name: I open up the core page
I enter the username in the username field on the login page
I enter the password in the password field on the login page
I click on the submit button of second button
I click on the eGifts tab to change view to eGifts
I click on the Amazon Gift Card
I select In bulk to multiple email addresses option from the drop down
I verify the new tab for Contact Us form
